thread.title: Check Out The Wiz Live's Fun and Fashionable First Photo!
thread.title_full: Check Out The Wiz Live's Fun and Fashionable First Photo!

author: Shelli Weinstein, TV GUIDE
title: Check Out The Wiz Live's Fun and Fashionable First Photo!
text:
David Alan Grier, Shanice Williams, Ne-Yo and Elijah Kelly, The Wiz Live! | Photo Credits: NBC Photo: 2015 NBCUniversal Media, LLC David Alan Grier, Shanice Williams, Ne-Yo and Elijah Kelly, The... Check Out The Wiz Live's Fun and Fashionable First Photo! 1 / 1 Back to Gallery 
NBC's trip down the yellow brick road is getting closer! The network released the first photo of the The Wiz Live 's cast arm-in-arm making their way to the Emerald City in some stylish threads. 
Take a look above at David Alan Grier almost unrecognizable as the Cowardly Lion, Shanice Williams as Dorothy, Ne-Yo as the grinning Tin Man and Elijah Kelley as a colorful and spry Scarecrow. And don't forget little Toto trotting along. 
Find your new TV obsession! 
NBC's latest live musical special also stars Queen Latifah as the Wizard, Mary J. Blige as the Wicked Witch of the West, Uzo Aduba as Glinda the Good and Amber Riley as Glinda's sister, Addaperle, the Good Witch of the North.
